text: Howard Morton Metzenbaum (June 4, 1917 - March 12, 2008) was an American politician and businessman. For almost 20 years, he was a Democratic member of the U.S. Senate from Ohio in 1974, an from 1976 to 1995. He also served in the Ohio House of Representatives and Senate from 1943 to 1951. Metzenbaum died at his home in Aventura, Florida on March 12, 2008, aged 90.Howard M. Metzenbaum, Who Battled Big Business as Ohio Senator, Dies at 90 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1917 births Category:2008 deaths Category:United States senators from Ohio Category:Politicians from Cleveland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Howard Metzenbaum
